name: Integrations
precondition:
Slack Import test files are kept in Google Drive here
You will use the above files for the tests.
It is important you have an account on the Slack team before exporting, so you can test claiming a Mattermost account imported from Slack.

customFields.Priority P1 to P4: P4 - Low-Impact (Edge or unsuitable to repeat?)

inline.description:
Integrations
–––––––––––––––––––––––––
  1. Go to the "integrations" channel
  2. Read through the webhook posts in the channel
inline.expectedResult: The posts in the channel should match the ones in the Slack channel.

customFields.Important notes about this step: Link previews from import are currently not supported.
